XHEADER.Title: Create xml configuration File for quick virtual machine

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML_KEY#, string : DEFINE &XML_NODES_KEY#, string, 10 : DEFINE &XML_NODE_VALUES#, string, 10
! ------------ Deployment name --------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="Name" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#
! ------------ Deployment Slot -------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="DeploymentSlot" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT_SLOT#
! ------------ Deployment Label ------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="Label" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT_LABEL#
! ------------ VM Name ---------------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="RoleList/Role/RoleName" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#
! ------------ VM Type ---------------------------------------- : DEFINE &USERNAME#, string : DEFINE &PASSWORD#, string : DEFINE &COMP_NAME#, string
: IF &UC4RB_AZR_VM_TYPE# EQ "Windows" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML_KEY# ="quick_windows_vm" : SET &USERNAME# = "AdminUsername" : SET &PASSWORD# = "AdminPassword" : SET &COMP_NAME# = "ComputerName" : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AZR_VM_TYPE# EQ "Linux" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML_KEY# ="quick_linux_vm" : SET &USERNAME# = "UserName" : SET &PASSWORD# = "UserPassword" : SET &COMP_NAME# = "HostName" : ENDIF : ENDIF
: SET &CONFIGURATIONSET_PATH# = "RoleList/Role/ConfigurationSets/ConfigurationSet/";
! ------------ Configuration Sets : ConfigurationSet: ComputerName ---------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&CONFIGURATIONSET_PATH#&COMP_NAME#" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_COMP_NAME#
! ------------ Configuration Sets : ConfigurationSet: Username --------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&CONFIGURATIONSET_PATH#&USERNAME#" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_USERNAME#
! ------------ Configuration Sets : ConfigurationSet: Password ---------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&CONFIGURATIONSET_PATH#&PASSWORD#" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_PASSWORD#
: SET &OSVIRTUALHARDDISK_PATH# = "RoleList/Role/OSVirtualHardDisk/";
! ------------ OSVirtualHardDisk : DiskName ----------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&OSVIRTUALHARDDISK_PATH#DiskName" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_DISKNAME#
! ------------ OSVirtualHardDisk : MediaLink(vhd)------------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&OSVIRTUALHARDDISK_PATH#MediaLink" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_VHD#
! ------------ OSVirtualHardDisk : SourceImageName ---------------------------- : SET &INDEX# = &INDEX#+ 1 : SET &XML_NODES_KEY#[&INDEX#]="&OSVIRTUALHARDDISK_PATH#SourceImageName" : SET &XML_NODE_VALUES#[&INDEX#]= &UC4RB_AZR_VM_SOURCE_IMAGE#
!------------ Creating xml file path --------------------------------------------- : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_FILENAME# = "create-quick-vm-&$TOP_PROCESSFLOW_RUNID#.xml" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_XML_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_AZR_FILENAME#)
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.PREP_VM_XML_CONFIG : SET &UC4RB_AZR_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_AZR_XML_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_AZR_XML_FILE_PATH#
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_AZR_FILE_PATH# ,,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# ,,"TOP"
